title: Amazing renovated 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom apartment for rent!!
posting_body: Amazing @@ this sweet 2 Bed/2 Bath townhouse is located in the heart of Atlanta yet set back from the street for the utmost in quiet and seclusion.

Offering an unexpected abundance of outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large shared patio, and topped with a third-floor wrap-around deck leading to a show-stopper of a roof-top terrace, with built-in planters, an irrigation system, and sweeping views of the Center City skyline and Landing.
The handsome stone and steel kitchen looks over the chic living room, with a fireplace, exposed brick, hardwood floors, and a built-in desk and shelves.
The second-floor bedroom is flanked by large windows and sliders with a Juliet balcony, a newly tiled three-piece bath, and convenient full-size laundry.
The third-floor primary suite is sun-drenched, with a large full bath and ample closet space, and access to the deck and rooftop.
A top-notch offering in a bar-none location.
